review: Treatment not complete before that asking money which I feel very bad am not satisfied with this Dr Prasun Killa

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We visited Dr Prasoon Killa for my sons braces.Dr Prasoon explained the whole procedure giving us enough time and answering all our queries.On procedure day he was patient and explained everything in detail to my son.He gave us so much time and was very patient.I would highly recommend him to anyone who is looking to get braces put.The team at Medident is good and services provided are excellent!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Overall very good. He explained the entire situation & process. Ensured that my child was not scared

Dr. Prasoon is an experienced *** ********* dentist. I consulted him for my daughter while living in Kolkata. He is an amazing human being with empathetic nature. He understood that my daughter was suffering because of keeping braces for too long. The treatment he provided fast tracked the alignment of her teeth. I recommend him to anyone who has dental issues.

I am getting only two clinic options of Apollo clinics. So, selecting one of those to submit my feedback. We went to Medident, Salt lake.
** ** ** ********* ******* His examination ans judgement is very right. He is very friendly with my 8years son. Very satisfied to meet him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

Dr. Prasoon listens to the patient very carefully, take care of every small problems, explains in detail, his treatment shows quick improvement or  expected result.
